availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Harrison (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Weber Harrison in Ohio County, Kentucky, on March 1, 1853. Father of Angeline Harrison, William A. Harrison, Sally J. Harrison, Mary C. Harrison. Farmer in Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed John F. Weber in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 12.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 7.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film 001913021, p. 121.
